TopicTitle: Dear SQUAD please do something about these ugly textures

Articles.Content:
Really, they're just BAD. Please, it's not that it takes too much work to change them to something more decent.

![15kIXnX.png](http://i.imgur.com/15kIXnX.png)

If you're talking about the stuff you see, I think you're crazy, that's subjected/opinionated

if its the inside, well you aren't meant to see it anyways...
Still, low-res placeholder textures shouldn't be in the release version.

> 
> Still, low-res placeholder textures shouldn't be in the release version.

This.

And the outside texture on the MK1 cockpit is nice, but it doesn't match the newer Mark 1 aircraft segments. Too much contrast, either smooth out the cockpit or make the tamks angular. Hopefully the first.
Doesn't look like you have texture detail turned all the way up to me.

Speaking of which, what's with all the black voids for endcaps? it looks terrible...

![SXuZ2og.png](http://i.imgur.com/SXuZ2og.png)

> 
> Still, low-res placeholder textures shouldn't be in the release version.

They are not placeholders. They were remade, but then PorkJet and other texturing masters came and those spaceplane parts don't looks so shiny anymore.

I agree they should be at least retextured to fit PorkJet's style.
